short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy redmine issue to clipboard, using format '[#9999]'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that allows copying the issue number with a single click when viewing a redmine issue. Simply click the extension icon or press Alt+Shift+C.
